DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: VASCONCELOS, Leandro Guarino de;VASCONCELOS, LEANDRO GUARINO DE;DE VASCONCELOS, LEANDRO GUARINO

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Atualmente, aluno do programa de Doutorado em Computao Aplicada no Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (INPE). Mestre em Cincia e Tecnologia da Computao pela Universidade Federal de Itajub/MG (2012). Especialista em Mdias Interativas pelo Centro Universitrio do Senac So Paulo (2011). Concluiu a Graduao em Tecnologia em Web Design e Programao pela Universidade do Sul de Santa Catarina (2007). Atualmente professor de cursos de graduao da FATEC Guaratinguet e de cursos de ps-graduao Lato Sensu nas Faculdades Integradas Teresa D'vila - FATEA - (Lorena/SP), Analista e Desenvolvedor de Sistemas de Informao no Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais - INPE. Tem experincia na rea de Cincia da Computao, com nfase em Software e Banco de Dados, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: minerao de dados, usabilidade e solues Web.

GRADUACAO.NOME-INSTITUICAO: Universidade do Sul de Santa Catarina
GRADUACAO.NOME-CURSO: Tecnologia em Web Design e Programao

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Atuao como docente/coordenador dos cursos da rea de Tecnologia da Informao, desde a oferta at a contratao de docentes para o desenvolvimento dos cursos.
Atuao como docente nas seguintes disciplinas: Estrutura de Dados, Banco de Dados Distribudo e Linguagem de Consulta de Banco de Dados

ATUACAO-PROFISSIONAL.NOME-INSTITUICAO: Universidade Estadual Paulista Jlio de Mesquita Filho

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Usatasker: A task definition tool for supporting the usability evaluation of web applications
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: USATASKER: A TASK DEFINITION TOOL FOR SUPPORTING THE USABILITY EVALUATION OF WEB APPLICATIONS

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: VASCONCELOS, Leandro Guarino de;VASCONCELOS, LEANDRO GUARINO DE;DE VASCONCELOS, LEANDRO GUARINO

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Everyday tens of new applications are deployed on the Web. In general, most of these applications have rich and complex interfaces, which are bound to present usability problems. However, for modern Web applications, usually developed in ?Internet time?, regular approaches for the evaluation of usability, based on laboratory tests, tend not to be appropriate, as they demand an amount of effort and time that developers are not willing to spend. In order to tackle this problem, we developed USABILICS, a system targeted for the automatic remote evaluation of usability based on an interface model. The proposed model allows the definition of tasks using a simple and intuitive approach, which can be applied to large and dynamic Web applications. In this paper, we detail this approach, presenting the tool that supports the definition of tasks. Moreover, we show that our approach is effective towards supporting the definition of complex tasks in a myriad of modern Web applications.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Everyday tens of new applications are deployed on the Web. In general, most of these applications have rich and complex interfaces, which are bound to present usability problems. However, for modern Web applications, usually developed in ?Internet time?, regular approaches for the evaluation of usability, based on laboratory tests, tend not to be appropriate, as they demand an amount of effort and time that developers are not willing to spend. In order to tackle this problem, we developed USABILICS, a system targeted for the automatic remote evaluation of usability based on an interface model. The proposed model allows the definition of tasks using a simple and intuitive approach, which can be applied to large and dynamic Web applications. In this paper, we detail this approach, presenting the tool that supports the definition of tasks. Moreover, we show that our approach is effective towards supporting the definition of complex tasks in a myriad of modern Web applications.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Exploiting client logs towards characterizing the user behavior on Web applications

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of SPIE, the International Society for Optical Engineering

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: VASCONCELOS, Leandro Guarino de;VASCONCELOS, LEANDRO GUARINO DE;DE VASCONCELOS, LEANDRO GUARINO

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Classifying user experience of web applications in real time using client logs

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: With the increasing use of the Internet, the Web has become the predominant means by which people obtain information. However, due to the fast growth of the amount and (sometimes competing) sources of resources available on the Web, users want to find information quickly and efficiently. Currently, web personalization has been explored in order to encourage user's feedback, improve usability and provide interesting content. In the literature, the most common approach is to analyze server logs, which contain information about what pages the user accesses during browsing. However, client logs contain more information about the user navigation. The amount of data of the client logs is significantly greater than the amount of server logs, and this is one factor that discourages analysis of client logs. In this paper, an approach is presented to classify the level of user's experience in real time, using indices of efficiency and effectiveness. The proposed approach, called RUX (Real-time User eXperience), contains an efficient algorithm for analyzing the user's behavior of web applications in real time using client logs. RUX focuses on the paths that a user goes through during the interaction, comparing them to previously defined tasks. RUX approach can be used by application developer to consume the classification of user's experience in real time, previously programming actions that can be taken. Experimental results show that the approach is efficient for aspects of data collection, latency and scalability.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Leveraging task-based data to support functional testing of web applications

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-3: Educao Mdia de Formao Tcnica Ou Profissional

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Ambiente Virtual de Aprendizagem a Distncia desenvolvido para auxiliar o processo de aprendizagem e facilitar a interao professor-aluno na educao presencial e, principalmente, na educao a distncia. Ferramentas como atividades, simulados, bate-papo, frum de discusses, relatrios sintticos e analticos e o gerenciamento de todo o sistema de uma forma simples e eficaz. Tudo isso disponvel 24 horas na Internet.
